mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coin_record(user_id, general_value, note, create_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{generalValue}, #{note}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT general_value AS generalValue, coin_value AS coinValue, note, create_time AS createTime FROM coin_record WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND general_value>=0 AND coin_value>=0
